gep.random

Class DefaultRandomEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • gep.random.DefaultRandomEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RandomEngine, java.io.Serializable

    public class DefaultRandomEngine
extends java.util.Random
implements RandomEngine
    An implementation of the RandomEngine interface by using Java's default random generator.
    Author:
    Johannes Wortmann
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultRandomEngine()
      Creates an instance of the default random engine with the current time as seed.
      DefaultRandomEngine(long seed)
      Creates an instance of the default random engine with the given seed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean decideBinaryDecision()
      Decides a binary decision where both possibilities have the same probability (This is equal to toss a fair coin).

      Decides a binary decision with respect to the given probability of deciding for yes.
      boolean decideTakeFunction()
      Decides if a function (true) or a terminal (false) should be generated.
      double getDouble()
      Returns a double between 0.0 and 1.0.

      Returns a integer between from (inclusive) and to (exclusive)

    • Method Detail

      • decideTakeFunction

        public boolean decideTakeFunction()
        Decides if a function (true) or a terminal (false) should be generated. The probability is uniformly distributed so both functions and terminals have a probability of 0.5
        Specified by:
        decideTakeFunction in interface RandomEngine
        Returns:
        true, if function shall be generated, false if instead a terminal should be generated

      • pickElement

        public <T extends GeneElement<?>> T pickElement(java.util.ArrayList<T> elements)
        Picks a element from the given set of elements using a uniform probability distribution.
        Specified by:
        pickElement in interface RandomEngine
        Parameters:
        elements - The gene elements from which an element should be chosen.
        Returns:
        The randomly picked element

      • decideBinaryDecision

        public boolean decideBinaryDecision(double probabilityYes)
        Description copied from interface: RandomEngine
        Decides a binary decision with respect to the given probability of deciding for yes. If probabilityYes is 0.5 this is equal to toss a fair coin.
        Specified by:
        decideBinaryDecision in interface RandomEngine
        Parameters:
        probabilityYes - The probability to say yes
        Returns:
        true, if the decision is yes. False, otherwise.

      • decideBinaryDecision

        public boolean decideBinaryDecision()
        Description copied from interface: RandomEngine
        Decides a binary decision where both possibilities have the same probability (This is equal to toss a fair coin).
        Specified by:
        decideBinaryDecision in interface RandomEngine
        Returns:
        true, if the decision is yes. False, otherwise.
